dict.acceptation: 钝的；迟钝的；呆滞的；阴暗的；

sent.orig: Hem! Although my ears are dull of hearing, my mind is not dull of apprehension.
sent.trans: 哼！虽然我的耳朵背了，可是我的脑子没迟钝。

sent.orig: An army without culture is a dull-witted army, and a dull-witted army cannot defeat the enemy.
sent.trans: 没有文化的军队是愚蠢的军队，而愚蠢的军队是不能战胜敌人的。

sent.orig: A dull face invited a dull fate.
sent.trans: 既有一张毫无光彩的脸，就只配过毫无光彩的生活。

sent.orig: Even when he is dull, or downright bad, he is dull in the grand manner.
sent.trans: 甚至当他是迟钝或者百分之百的糟糕时，他是以宏大的方式迟钝。

sent.orig: Goes dull to that magnificent palace one dull, my are in any case the gold.
sent.trans: 到那座华丽的宫殿去呆一呆，反正我有的是黄金嘛。
